statements: SELECT show_title, show_date, ticket_price FROM upcoming_shows;
SELECT show_id, show_title FROM upcoming_shows WHERE show_date >= '2022-01-01';
SELECT * FROM upcoming_shows ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT show_title, show_date FROM upcoming_shows WHERE ticket_price < 50.00;
SELECT show_id, show_title, ticket_price FROM upcoming_shows WHERE show_id IN (1, 3, 5);
SELECT * FROM upcoming_shows ORDER BY show_date DESC, show_id ASC LIMIT 10
SELECT show_title, ticket_price FROM upcoming_shows WHERE show_date >= '2022-10-01' ORDER BY ticket_price DESC
SELECT show_id, show_title, ticket_price FROM upcoming_shows WHERE ticket_price > 50.00 ORDER BY show_title ASC
SELECT * FROM upcoming_shows WHERE show_date >= '2022-11-01' AND ticket_price BETWEEN 30.00 AND 70.00 ORDER BY show_date DESC
SELECT show_title, show_date FROM upcoming_shows WHERE show_date < '2022-09-15' ORDER BY show_title ASC
SELECT * FROM shows
SELECT show_title, show_date FROM shows
SELECT show_title, ticket_price FROM shows WHERE ticket_price > 50.00
SELECT * FROM tickets
SELECT seat_number, customer_name FROM tickets
SELECT * FROM shows WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01' ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT show_title, ticket_price FROM shows WHERE ticket_price BETWEEN 50 AND 100 ORDER BY ticket_price ASC;
SELECT show_title, customer_name FROM shows JOIN tickets ON shows.show_id = tickets.show_id WHERE shows.show_date < '2022-06-01' AND tickets.customer_name LIKE 'J%' ORDER BY customer_name;

SELECT show_title, seat_number, customer_name FROM shows JOIN tickets ON shows.show_id = tickets.show_id WHERE shows.show_date BETWEEN '2022-04-01' AND '2022-05-31' ORDER BY shows.show_date ASC, customer_name DESC;
SELECT AVG(ticket_price) AS average_ticket_price, COUNT(*) AS total_shows FROM shows WHERE show_date < '2022-12-31';
SELECT * FROM shows
SELECT show_title, show_date FROM shows
SELECT MAX(ticket_price) AS max_price FROM shows
SELECT show_title, ticket_price FROM shows WHERE ticket_price > 50
SELECT theater_name, location FROM theaters
SELECT show_title, show_date, ticket_price FROM shows WHERE show_id = 1
SELECT theater_name, location FROM theaters WHERE theater_id = 3
SELECT booking_id, booking_date FROM bookings WHERE booking_id = 5
SELECT show_title, ticket_price FROM shows WHERE ticket_price > 50
SELECT show_title, theater_name, location FROM shows INNER JOIN theaters ON shows.show_id = theaters.theater_id
SELECT * FROM show;
SELECT show_title, show_date FROM show ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT show_title, ticket_price FROM show WHERE ticket_price >= 50;
SELECT theater_name, location FROM theater;
SELECT show_id, customer_name, num_tickets FROM booking WHERE num_tickets > 5 ORDER BY show_id ASC;
SELECT show_title, show_date, ticket_price FROM show WHERE ticket_price > 50;
SELECT theater_name, location FROM theater WHERE location = 'New York';
SELECT actor_name FROM actor ORDER BY actor_name ASC;
SELECT show_title, show_date, ticket_price FROM show WHERE show_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-01-31';
SELECT customer_name, num_tickets FROM booking ORDER BY num_tickets DESC;
SELECT * FROM shows;
SELECT show_title, show_date, ticket_price FROM shows ORDER BY show_date DESC;
SELECT theater_name, city, capacity FROM theaters WHERE city = 'New York';
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE customer_name LIKE 'A%';
SELECT show_title, rating, review_text FROM shows INNER JOIN reviews ON shows.show_id = reviews.show_id;
SELECT * FROM shows WHERE show_date > '2022-01-01';
SELECT show_title, ticket_price FROM shows WHERE ticket_price > 50 ORDER BY ticket_price DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT city FROM theaters ORDER BY city;
SELECT show_title, customer_name, booking_date FROM shows JOIN bookings ON shows.show_id = bookings.show_id JOIN customers ON bookings.customer_id = customers.customer_id;
SELECT customer_name, email FROM customers WHERE LENGTH(email) > 0 ORDER BY customer_name ASC;
